title: Lamp
description:
Terra cotta lamp (?) in the form of a bowl with two pierced handles. Top closed except for central opening; conventionalized lotus in raised relief decorates top. Conventionalized lotus on base.
Condition: General condition good. One handle chipped. Major portion of surface covered with black pigment.
credit_line: Gift of Evangeline Wilbour Blashfield, Theodora Wilbour, and Victor Wilbour honoring the wishes of their mother, Charlotte Beebe Wilbour, as a memorial to their father, Charles Edwin Wilbour

museum_location.name: This item is not on view

If you have any information regarding this work and rights to it, please contact copyright@brooklynmuseum.org.

completeness.name: Meh
completeness.description: Some data is approved, but records are far from fully vetted. Objects rarely have photos or descriptions.
